mapper.select: select * from product where category1_id=#{param1} and category2_id=#{param2}

SELECT p.product_id, p.p_name, p.p_price, p.p_image, p.p_thumbnail, o.opt_id, o.opt_name, SUM(o.opt_stock) AS stock FROM product p JOIN p_option o ON p.product_id = o.product_id GROUP BY p.product_id, p.p_name, p.p_price, p.p_image, p.p_thumbnail, o.opt_id, o.opt_name
mapper.update: update product set p_hits = p_hits+1 where product_id=#{param1}
